word: black canyon of the gunnison national park

uk: blæk ˌkæn.jən əv ðə ˌɡʌn.ɪ.sən ˌnæʃ.ən.əl ˈpɑːk
us: blæk ˌkæn.jən əv ðə ˌɡʌn.ɪ.sən ˌnæʃ.ən.əl ˈpɑːrk

body_content.explanation: a national park (= a large area of land protected by the government because of its natural beauty or because it has a special history) in the US state of Colorado:
examples: The Red Rock Canyon area is located near the south rim of Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park.
Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park is located 250 miles southwest of Denver.
